entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon.
